description: Snapshot of Telemetry Data from a SpaceHeat SCADA. A snapshot of all current sensed states, sent from a spaceheat SCADA to its AtomicTNode. The nth element of each of the three lists refer to the same reading (i.e., what is getting read, what the value is, what the TelemetryNames are.)

DataChannelList.description: The list of Data Channels in the Snapshot

ScadaReadTimeUnixMsList.title: ReportTimeUnixMs
ScadaReadTimeUnixMsList.description: The time, in unix ms, that each reading was taken.

Axiom1.title: ListLengthConsistency
Axiom1.description: DataChannelList, ValueList, and ScadaReadTimeUnixMs must all have the same length.
